707090f-b.text:
Troy Avenue, south from Herkimer Street.  The old house, on the left, fronts on the latter street.

View 2 #1 north across Herkimer Street, showing the rear of the old house and the stucco Seventh Adventist Church, at the northeast corner of the intersection.

P. L. Sperr   August 27, 1941
Views 1, 2

View 1: Neg. No. A-1015
View 2: Net. No. A-1016
